authors.author: St. Paul Students' Choir (University of Nairobi)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hii ndiyo siri ya maisha mema,
na tena utamu wa kumjua Yesu,
bahati kaacha karamu kubwa.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Bahati bahati nayo
imwangukie nani,
bahati bahati aliyeipata ni nani.
Imeandaliwa kwa wote
wenye moyo safi.
Simama uonje na!
moyo wako utasisimka). x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wateule mbona mnasitasita,
hana ubaguzi wote awaita,
bahati kaacha karamu kubwa,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Kama una dhambi nenda ukatubu,
Bwana hakatai mtu atubupo,
bahati kaacha karamu kubwa.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Kama u mgonjwa,
Bwana anaponya,
kama una njaa utapata shibe,
bahati kaacha karamu kubwa.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Yote ya dunia yakikukabili,
piga moyo konde,
nenda kwake Bwana,
bahati kaacha karamu kubwa.
